entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.3°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
